trans-unit.source: Supports the page parser in building a template and the child controls it contains.
trans-unit.target: 支援頁面剖析器建置它所包含的控制項範本和子系。

trans-unit.source: To use a custom TemplateBuilder class for a control, create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> for the control, and then return the custom TemplateBuilder control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用控制項的自訂 TemplateBuilder 類別，建立自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>控制項和自訂 TemplateBuilder 控制項從然後傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Used during design time to build the template and its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段期間用來建立範本和它的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Called by the parser to inform the builder that the parsing of the control's opening and closing tags is complete.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以通知的產生器控制項的開頭和結尾標記的剖析已完成的剖析器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the template builder when a Web request is made.
trans-unit.target: 提出 Web 要求時，會初始化範本產生器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateParser"></xref> responsible for parsing the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateParser"> </xref>負責剖析控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> responsible for building the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"> </xref>負責建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> assigned to the control that the builder will create.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>指派給產生器會建立控制項。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The name of the tag to build.
trans-unit.target: 要建置的標記名稱。

trans-unit.source: This allows the builder to support multiple tag types.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓以支援多個標記類型產生器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ID*> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ID*>指派給控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ID*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that holds all the specified tag attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>保存所有指定的標記的屬性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Defines the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object that child controls and templates belong to in design time.
trans-unit.target: 定義<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>物件在設計階段，隸屬於子控制項和範本。

trans-unit.source: The InstantiateIn method is required when implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface.
trans-unit.target: InstantiateIn 方法時，需要實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: The InstantiateIn method is used only in design time.
trans-unit.target: InstantiateIn 方法只能用於設計階段使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to contain the instances of controls from the inline template.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>包含內嵌樣板控制項的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the control builder needs to get its inner text.
trans-unit.target: 判斷控制項產生器要取得其內部文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A> method needs to be called when we are in design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A>需要我們會在設計階段時要呼叫的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NeedsTagInnerText method returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.InDesigner%2A> property of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: NeedsTagInnerText 方法會傳回值之<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.InDesigner%2A>屬性的基底<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.InDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control builder needs to get its inner text.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項產生器需要取得其內部文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves the inner text of the template tag.
trans-unit.target: 儲存範本標記的內部文字。

trans-unit.source: The SetTagInnerText method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SetTagInnerText 方法會覆寫基底類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法設定的值和<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.Text%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The inner text of the template.
trans-unit.target: 範本的內部文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text between the opening and closing tags of the template.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字的開頭和結尾標記的範本之間。

trans-unit.source: The Text property is used by the designer to specify or determine the text that appears between the opening and closing tags of the template.
trans-unit.target: Text 屬性可由設計工具來指定，或決定出現在開頭和結尾標記的範本之間的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text that appears between the opening and closing tags of the template.
trans-unit.target: 開頭和結尾標記的範本之間出現的文字。
